remark: set this board as left or right joycon
see which side is this board
response: A string containing `LEFT` or `RIGHT`; `unknown` if incorrectly set up

remark: release all buttons on this board
move stick to x and y value. x y should be between 0 and 255 inclusive; 127 is netural position
move stick back to netural position
stick disengage; give physical stick control back to user
release all buttons; as well as disengage the stick
